name: Meditate
description: Is a practice where an individual uses a technique such as mindfulness, or focusing the mind on a particular object.

name: Pearl Dagger
description: Taken by Iroh from a defeated general in the Siege of Ba Sing Se and passed on to Zuko.

name: Compression
description: It is possible for earthbenders to compress large chunks of rock into smaller, denser chunks, or to compress several smaller chunks into one big piece of rock.

name: Healing
description: A sub-skill of waterbending that allows the bender to heal wounds by using water as a catalyst.

name: Avatar State
description: Is a defense mechanism, designed to empower you with the skills and knowledge of all the past Avatars.

name: Lightning Redirection
description: A sub-skill of firebending that allows a firebender to absorb lightning into their body as energy and release it in a more desirable direction.

name: Seismic Sense
description: A unique ability to perceive an environment by feeling acute vibrations through the ground.

name: Energy Bending
description: Is the ability to bend another person's life energy.
